title: Position of the building and of other buildings, if any, which the applicant intends to erect, upon
clause_text: Position of the building and of other buildings, if any, which the applicant intends to erect, upon his contiguous land referred to in (i) above;

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
